üåêField of Expertise:

‚ûñObject Detection and Recognition: Identifying and localizing objects within images or videos in complex scenarios and custom objectives.
‚ûñImage Classification: Categorizing images into predefined classes or categories including multi-class and multi-labels.
‚ûñFace Recognition: Identifying and verifying individuals based on facial features. Applications include Facial authentication, security systems, and user identification.
‚ûñGesture Recognition: Understanding and interpreting hand, body and eye gestures for human-computer interaction.
‚ûñImage Instance & Semantic Segmentation: Taing object detection to the next stage, rather than just classifying the region of an image how about classifying each pixel? Dividing an image into segments or regions with similar characteristics.
‚ûñMedical Imaging: Analyzing medical images for diagnosis, treatment planning, and research. Applications: X-ray analysis, MRI image segmentation, and pathology detection.
‚ûñVideo Analysis and Object Tracking: Analyzing and extracting information from video streams. Applications include Surveillance, action recognition, video classification, person tracking and sports analytics.
‚ûñIndustrial Inspection: Automated inspection of manufactured products for quality control.
‚ûñAgricultural Vision: Monitoring and optimizing agricultural processes using computer vision. Applications include: Monitoring cattle, crop disease classification, Land management etc.
